books.author: by James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: President Jonathan Duncan, a Gulf War veteran and widower, takes on adversaries at home and abroad.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT IS MISSING

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A detective investigates a seemingly wholesome member of the community when an 11-year-old boy’s body is found.
books.name: THE OUTSIDER

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Survivors of a mass shooting outside a mall in Portland, Me., develop different coping mechanisms and face a new menace.
books.name: SHELTER IN PLACE

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 46th book in the Stone Barrington series.
books.name: TURBULENCE

books.author: by Jim Butcher
books.description: A dozen stories about Harry Dresden, Chicago’s only professional wizard.
books.name: BRIEF CASES

books.author: by Lauren Weisberger
books.description: Emily Charlton plans a comeback from the suburbs. From the author of "The Devil Wears Prada."
books.name: WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU LULULEMONS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Amos Decker, known as the Memory Man, puts his talents toward solving a string of murders in a Rust Belt town.
books.name: THE FALLEN

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: A tarot card reader mistakenly receives an inheritance letter and attends the funeral of the deceased.
books.name: THE DEATH OF MRS. WESTAWAY

books.author: by Catherine Steadman
books.description: A documentary filmmaker and an investment banker must decide whether they should protect a secret.
books.name: SOMETHING IN THE WATER

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The latest installment in the Women’s Murder Club series.
books.name: THE 17TH SUSPECT

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher tracks down the owner of a pawned West Point class ring and stumbles upon a large criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LINE

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Robin Burcell
books.description: Sam and Remi Fargo search for a Rolls-Royce prototype that has vanished for a second time.
books.name: THE GRAY GHOST

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE
